models.domain

Class Activity

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.domain.Activity

  • @Entity
public class Activity
extends java.lang.Object
    Activity Entity Describes the activities that a student can participate
    Author:
    Konstantinos Christofilos , Pavlos Gerardos , Sokratis Pantazaras

      • createSessions

        public void createSessions(java.util.Date startDate,
                  java.util.Date endDate,
                  boolean[] selection)
        Creates the set of all activity sessions between (and including) two dates, for the specified week days only
        Parameters:
        startDate - starting date for activity sessions
        endDate - closing date for activity sessions
        selection - a boolean array of 7 places, indicating the days of the week when activity sessions are scheduled
